K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358a-1: a'arya p'urna pa ri pritstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-1: 'phags pa gang pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-5: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med tshad med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-15: tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-18: yon tan mchog mngon par bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:358b-19: grags pa shin tu mtho zhing rgyang ring ba /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359a-3: grags pa mtho zhing rgyang ring dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359a-6: ji ltar sems ni sbyong bar bgyi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359a-8: ji ltar sems can rab sgrol cing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359a-16: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359a-17: mang thos rgya mtsho lta bu tshol //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359b-2: ji lta bur ni tshig gcig gis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359b-5: mang thos mthar thug ma mchis pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359b-6: rgol ba mchis kyang sems mi g-yo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:359b-16: sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360a-13: thogs pa mi mnga'i mkhyen brnyes pas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360a-15: chos rnams thams cad legs bslab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360a-16: yon tan mtho zhing mngon par 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360a-17: mun bcom shes rab snang bskyed pas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360a-22: bdud dpung dag ni pham par mdzad //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:360b-2: rtag par byams pa'i thugs ldan zhing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368a-26: rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-0: de nas de'i tshe bcom @368b ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-1: rtag tu mang thos gnyer 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-3: yang dag nges don thob 'gyur pas;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-4: de phyir rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-5: yi ge 'bru ni gcig pu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-6: tshig gi don ni gcig tsam yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-7: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-8: brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-9: de phyir yang dag chos gnyer bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-10: gnyer nas tshul bzhin bsam bya yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-11: chos kyi mtshan nyid mi blang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-12: sangs rgyas bsngags la zhen mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-14: yang dag chos ni dran par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-15: 'dod chags rtsod med sems kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-16: 'dren pa yongs su btsal bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-17: rtag par sems can rnams la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-18: byams pa'i sems ni bsgom par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-19: sems can la ni zhen med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-20: chos rnams thams cad zhi bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-21: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-24: mang du thos pa de las skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-25: ji ltar nam mkha' ngo bo nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-27: chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-29: ngas ni shes rab stobs dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:368b-30: bskal pa tshad med grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-2: 'on kyang bshad pa zhes mi brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-3: sems can nyid ni ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-4: thams cad mi lus thob gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-5: kun kyang rab tu byung nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-6: mang thos kun dga' bzhin gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-7: gzungs thob byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-8: sems can de dag thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-9: bskal pa bye bar chos bshad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-10: de yi shes rab gtugs mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-11: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtshungs med dam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-12: nam mkha' 'dra bar tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-13: nam mkha' skye 'byung med pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-14: mkhyen pa yang ni de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-15: klu yis chu ni ma blangs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-16: char chen dag ni 'bebs byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-17: chu de la ni gnas med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-18: char 'bebs pa la mthar thug med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-19: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-20: gzungs 'di thob par gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-21: chos rnams la ni gnas med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-22: rkyen de bshad na zad mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-23: de phyir mang thos btsal bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-24: btsal nas chu bzhin gnas bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-25: chos dbyings sangs rgyas rjes dran na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-26: mang du thos pa de las skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-27: byams pas sems can kun khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-28: sems can mtshan ma zhi byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-29: chos kyi mtshan ma'ang zhi byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369a-30: mang du thos pa'ang de las skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-0: mang du thos pa'i @369b le'u ste; gnyis pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-7: sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-8: don gyi tshul rab tu sems par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-10: zhes smra bar mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-13: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-14: bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-15: ma thos chos ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-16: don gyi tshul ni legs byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-17: chos min zhes ni smra mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-18: gal te stong pa'i chos thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-19: rtag tu don tshul tshol byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-21: byang chub lam ni de nas skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-22: ma thos chos ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-23: don gyi tshul ni tshol byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-24: byang chub las ni mi ldog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-26: ma thos chos ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-27: nga rgyal ngan pa'i sems mi 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:369b-28: g-yo sgyu dag kyang skyed mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-2: ma thos chos ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-3: de yi don ni tshol byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-4: sngon chad thos par ma gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-5: rtse gcig tu ni sems par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-6: gang zag des ni chos thos tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-7: yang dag chos ni thos 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-8: rtag par sangs rgyas mang mthong bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-9: byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-10: sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-11: tshul bzhin zhu ba zhu byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-12: nyan thos dag gis thos na yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-13: thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-14: 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad ldan pas; ;'di 'dra'i zhu ba zhu bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-15: bdag cag bsam pa'ang yod min na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-16: dngos po 'di thos ci smos zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-17: nyan thos ngo mtshar brjod pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-18: lha klu thams cad dga' 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-19: sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod 'gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-21: zhu ba gang yod zhus pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-22: sangs rgyas de bzhin lan 'debs pa; ;'khor 'dus mang po tshad med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-23: thams cad phan pa che thob 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-24: byang chub sems dpa' lan 'debs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-25: mang thos 'di ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-26: 'khor med tshad med thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-27: bla med chos mig thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-0: byang chub sems @370b dpa' sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur pa na mngon par yid ches pas dang du len cing 'gal ba med pa'i sems kyis tshul bzhin du bsam nas 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-1: ma yin no; ;zhes smra bar mi byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-2: des sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-4: sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-7: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-9: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-12: bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:370b-13: lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-0: bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor 'dus pa re re la yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gangg'a'i klung brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bye ma snyed chos rnams la len pa med cing zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par @371a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-1: grol ba sha stag byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi grangs kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-4: bcom ldan 'das de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khrir gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-5: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar nye ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba brgya phrag mang po kun tu khyab par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-6: 'dzam bu'i gling re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' re re gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-8: bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i nyan thos rnams khad kyis le lo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-9: snyom las can du gyur pas 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo dag kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-10: chos rnams stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371a-11: tshul khrims rnam par dag cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyang mthar gyis nub par gyur te; de dag gis klog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-0: rnam par bshad par ma byas pa'i phyir de'i bstan pa la chos @371b kyi sde snod shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-1: chos kyi sde snod re re la yang mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-2: mdo'i sde re re la yang ched du brjod pa'i sde sum khri drug brgya yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-3: ched du brjod pa'i sde re re la yang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag drug khri bdun brgya yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod mang po de dag las mdo'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-6: ched du brjod pa'i sde 'ba' zhig lus par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-7: de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu bo che zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-9: mang du thos shing rgya che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:371b-12: don gyi tshul gsal bar rtogs pa des rtag par sngon ma thos pa'i chos bsgrag pa la mos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-0: des chos bsgrags par gyur pa na skye bo phal cher skur pa 'debs shing 'gal bar byas par gyur pas chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa de 'di snyam du 'di ltar skye bo mang po 'di dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur kyang mngon par yid ma ches pas mnyan @372a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-2: len par mos pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-3: gal te thos par gyur na yang khong du mi chud pas rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing 'gal bar byas nas skyon 'byin par byed pas 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-5: sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-6: ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-8: bdag cag gis sngon chad nam yang slob dpon dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-9: mkhan po las 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ma thos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-10: gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan rgan rabs gang yang slob dpon dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-11: mkhan po las 'di lta bu brgyud de thos par mi smra bas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-12: zhes dge slong mang po de skad kyang zer la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-14: ched du brjod pa'i sde tsam las ma lus pas deng bdag ci'i phyir bdag gcig pu gnas dben par mi 'gro snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-16: chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa de de snyam du bsam nas gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-17: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na bskal pa chags tshun chad grong khyer chen po chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa; zheng du dpag tshad bdun yod cing rab tu mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-18: lam srang rnams thad kar 'bab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372a-19: skye bo mang pos gang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-0: lo legs shing bde bar @372b gyur pa drug khri brgya stong yod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-1: de'i 'og tu phyis kyang grong khyer chung du kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-9: nang gi chung ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad gcig yod pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-11: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer chen po rab tu dben pa zhes bya ba na khyim bdag sha na zhes bya ba byung ba de'i bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-12: ma h'a shu ma ta zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-13: khyim bdag gi bu de dben pa la gnas pa las; lha zhig 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-14: khyod kyi nan tan chos dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-15: btsal nas tshul bzhin soms shig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal; ;khyod 'tshang rgya bar lung ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-18: lha des tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-19: de nas khyim bdag gi bu de pha'i drung du song nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-21: rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i bstan pa las tshangs par spyod par 'dod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-23: de nas khyim bdag sha nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-24: nga yi khyim na rin chen mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:372b-25: gser dngul dag ni tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-2: nga yi khyim na ldan par yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-3: ngas ni rin chen btsal ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-4: bu 'dod spyod phyir btsal btsal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-5: ci phyir rab tu 'byung byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-6: 'jig rten smod la dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-7: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des tshigs su bcad de pha la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-8: bdag ni rtag tu chos tshol mos; ;btsal nas yang dag tshul bzhin sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-9: longs spyod myong bar mi dga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-11: khyim gyi rin chen mi dgos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-12: bdag ni 'dod pa nyung la mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-13: chos kyi gter ni dbyung ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-14: rab tu 'byung bar mos pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-15: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-16: chos bstan pa yang rab tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-17: deng bdag sangs rgyas bstan phrad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-18: ci yi phyir na gtang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-20: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des pha'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas phyir byung ste 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-21: pha ni bye ba 'bum yod la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-22: ma ni bye ba brgya yod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-23: deng bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-24: gang gis kyang ni bzlog mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-25: deng bdag lus srog pha ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373a-26: gnyen 'dab kun ni rab spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-0: sangs rgyas @373b chos ni mi spong par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-1: rab byung spyod pa gnyer bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-3: de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-4: chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob ga la ba der song nas chos mnyan pa gnyer bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-5: de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba mthu chen thob pas kyang de la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-6: de nas dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde thos par gyur nas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-7: bdag gis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde sngon chad ma thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-8: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di sus ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-13: yang dag par blangs nas 'dzin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-16: mthu chen thob pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:373b-17: bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu'i dbang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo rang gi ngang gis sems la gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-0: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas 'di skad smras pa thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed de rjes su bsam pas @374a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-1: shes rab kyi mthu skyes pas shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i stobs kyis chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la dri ba dris pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-2: mthu chen thob pas kyang don gyi rjes su lan yang dag par btab nas 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-3: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po la dge slong zhig gis dngos po 'di /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-4: deng khyod kyis ji skad dris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-5: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du yang dag par lan btab pa dge slong des thos par gyur nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-9: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la yang 'di skad du dris pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-10: mthu chen thob pas kyang 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-11: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po la dge slong zhig gis dngos po 'di /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-12: deng khyod kyis ji skad dris pa de bzhin du zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du lan yang dag par btab pa dge slong des thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-0: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad @374b ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-2: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa las zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-3: lan 'debs pa'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-4: mthu chen thob pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-6: shin tu yid ches par dka' bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-7: dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar zhog cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-8: gzhan yang gang lus kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa mngon sum du ma byas pa dag gis kyang shin tu yid ches par dka'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-9: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du ma h'a shu ma tas kye skyes bu dam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-10: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa las zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-11: lan 'debs pa'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-12: mthu chen thob pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-13: dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar zhog cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-14: gal te khong du ma chud par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-15: deng khyod la dpes nye bar mtshon par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-16: blo dang ldan pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-19: dge slong dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po las sems can gyi rang bzhin thos pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-20: sa chen po'i rnam pa bas ches mang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:374b-22: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sems can gyi rnam pa gzugs can nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-4: 'du shes med 'du shes med min ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis mi'i lus thob nas shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-5: sems can de dag re res kyang yun se gol gtogs pa gcig la gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi dri ba so so nas mi mthun pa dag dris par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-7: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa gcig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-8: bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du dri ba mang po de lta bu dris par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-9: gzhan yang gang zag gcig gis se gol gtogs pa gcig la gang zag de snyed kyi dri ba tha dad cing mi mthun pa thams cad dris par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-10: de bzhin du gzhan yang gang zag gcig gis sems can ma lus pa mthar thug pa snyed kyi dri ba sna tshogs pa bskal pa gcig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-11: bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar dris par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-13: dri ba de dag ci mang ba yin snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375a-15: de shin tu mang bas dper sla ba yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-0: mthu chen thob pas dge slong ma h'a shu ma ta la @375b smras pa; bdag gis deng khyod la yang dag par smras pa yin gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-2: ji ltar sems can ma lus pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gcig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-3: bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du the tshom dris pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-4: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi rnam grangs gcig thos pa'i sgo nas lan btab pa de bas kyang ches mang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-5: de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-16: 'bum la sogs pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-18: bdag gis mdo tsam du bstan na bgrang ba'i ming dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-19: yi ge ji snyed pa thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-22: bsam gyis mi khyab pas grangs de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur kyang bdag gis ma lus par kha ton du bton nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-24: dris pa de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs gcig tu 'dus par bdag gis rab tu shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:375b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i lam gyi tshig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-2: rab tu lci ba'i tshig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-4: gting dpag dka' ba'i tshig gang yin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-6: sgo gcig tu chos thams cad sdud pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-8: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dag yin pas chos thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-9: tshig thams cad kyang sgo des gzhi byed pas thams cad sgo der 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-11: ched du brjod pa'i sde thams cad kyang sgo der zhugs nas yi ge gcig rnam par phye nas yi ge mang po la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-13: de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo bdun khri brgyad stong po thams cad la yang 'jug par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-14: de la yang dbang po rnams kyi bye brag dgu khri nyis stong yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-15: sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo nas kyang gzugs kyi kha dog brgyad khri yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-16: lam gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa'i gzugs ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi mi gang yin pa yang bdag gis rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-17: gzugs de dag re re la yang ming brgya yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-18: de bzhin du ming nyis brgya dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376a-19: ming sum brgya yod pa nas ming brgya stong du ma yod pa'i bar dag kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-0: 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa nas phyogs bcu'i sangs @376b rgyas kyi zhing khams las 'das pa'i bar dag na yod pa'i dmigs pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-1: ming tha dad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos rnams so so tha dad pa'i bye brag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-5: lan gyi bye brag ji snyed yod pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bdag gis rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-7: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par rjes su bskor cing bdag gis gsol pa btab pa bzhin du gnang bar mdzad du gsol; bdag gis yang dag par bsrung zhing chos mnyan par 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-13: mthu chen thob pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-14: da ltar gyi dus kyi dge slong rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-15: thams cad kyang le lo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-16: snyom las can du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-17: dge ba'i chos la gsog pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa med pas khyod de skad ma zer cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:376b-18: ma h'a shu ma tas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-0: @377a *// deng phyin chad dge ba'i chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas chos de gnyer bar bgyid pas le lo mi bgyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-2: dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas mthu chen thob pa grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-4: grong rdal du 'jug cing yang dag pa'i chos bshad par gsol ba btab nas rjes su srung bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-5: sngon ma thos pa'i chos yang dag par mnyan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-7: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma ta skye bo rnams kyis rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-8: bsnyen bkur byas te mang po kun gyis tshul khrims srung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-9: shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-10: mang du thos pa'i yon tan mchog tshad med pa dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-12: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-14: grong rdal dag tu song nas sems can mang po yang dag pa'i chos la gzud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-15: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kun tu spel ba'i ched du chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-17: de'i tshe dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas skye bo mang po rnams yang dag par bskul nas chos la mchog tu bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377a-18: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la bsnyen bkur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-1: yang dag par srung ba byed du bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-3: chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa yang dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas yang dag par bsrung ba byas pas phyis grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-5: grong rdal dag tu song nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos bskal pa grangs med pa rnams su byang chub mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya cher yang dag par bshad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-6: kun tu rgya cher rab tu spel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-8: 'di ltar dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas kyang lo brgya'i bar du rtag par chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos rnams yang dag par dris kyang rtag par gsar du tha dad pa'i chos yang dag par bstan gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-9: nam yang zlos bu smras par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:377b-11: chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa yang dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas yang dag par rab tu bsrungs pa'i phyir sems can tshad med pa snyed 'phags pa'i bstan pa la yang dag par btsud nas sems can tshad med pa snyed sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yang dag par bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-0: khyod kyi de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba mthu chen thob pas dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrungs shing chos legs par bshad pa de gzhan yin pa snyam @378a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-4: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-6: dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas kyang chos smra ba yang dag par bsrungs shing gsol ba btab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-7: grogs byas pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus shi ba'i 'og tu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i zhing du skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems can thams cad kyi the tshom yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-8: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-9: zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjod nas de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378a-10: mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas yang dag pa nyid du sems pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-0: dge slong ma h'a shu ma ta 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab ces bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams @378b cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-1: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-2: zhes pa'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjod nas de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-3: mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-4: de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-5: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-6: zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjod nas de la chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-7: mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:378b-8: de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-1: gshegs pa des kyang legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-2: zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-3: mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na sems can tshad med snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-5: dge slong ma h'a shu ma tas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po phrad nas mdo sde mang po zhus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-6: sems can yongs su bzlas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa gang yin pa de dag ngas gal te bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-7: bskal pa las lhag par brjod par gyur na yang sangs rgyas mang po de dag gi mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:379a-8: sems can ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-9: bdag ci'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos dmigs su med pa dag la las mngon par 'dus byas nas zhe sdang bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-10: 'du byed kyi rgyu rkyen slong bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-11: deng bdag gis zhe sdang dang 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-13: skye ba med pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid du blta bar bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-14: bdag nyid kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-15: deng bdag gis mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-17: skye ba med pa'i chos la blta bar bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-18: mngon par 'du bya ba dang 'byung ba'i chos la gnas par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:399b-19: bdag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams bsam par bya'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-1: gis yang dag pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa la 'di la nan gyis chos su 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-2: yang dag pa ma yin pa la nan gyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-6: chos kyi ngo bo la gnas pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-9: chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid mthar stong pa nyid la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-10: gnas par bya ba'i chos kyi ngo bo gzod ma nyid nas med pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-11: snyam du bsam par bya'o; ;byang chub sems dpas da ltar chos rnams yid la byas par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-12: de'i sems rab tu dben par gyur pas zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-13: 'khon du 'dzin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-20: sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-21: 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas spos dri zhim pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-24: me tog mchog dam pa dag lus la gtor ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-26: me tog mchog dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-28: me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-29: me tog pa ri sha ka'i phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400a-30: me tog mang po'i phreng ba dag gis lus la g-yogs par gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-0: @400b yang na gos mchog dam pa shin tu phra zhing 'jam pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-8: de dag la sogs pa gos phra zhing 'jam pa dag gis lus la g-yogs par gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-9: yang na dar gyi lda ldi mchog dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-12: ba dan dag bdag nyid kyi steng du bres par gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-13: yang na lha'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-16: rin po che'i phreng ba dag gis lus la g-yogs par gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-17: yang na lha'i kha zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i re dang ldan pa dag khyer te 'ongs nas byin par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-18: byang chub sems dpas mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag la sred pa'i sems bskyed nas mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-19: rkyen des gang zag de dag la brten nas yid dang mthun par byas te phan tshun 'drul zhing gtam smra bar yang mi bya'o; ;phyogs gcig pa'i sems kyis rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-20: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems snyoms par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-21: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs par byas nas 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can rnams la khong khro bar yang mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:400b-22: rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-1: sdang gi dngos po gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa yin pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-2: deng bdag gis de dag la sred pa mi skyed par chos rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid legs par rtogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-4: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nang na sred pa'i rkyen gyis phrad par gyur pa 'di mchog tu lci pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-5: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa de ni; rus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-6: rkang la yang thal te 'gro bas kun tu sbyor ba skyed pa'i chos kyi nang na sred pa'i sems kyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-7: shin tu mngon par zhen par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-9: 'dod chags par bya ba'i dngos po gal te yid bzhin tu thob par ma gyur na zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur bas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-11: rang gi lus la 'dod chags kyi srid pa skyed par byed pas de dag gal te 'ga' zhig gis gnod par byas par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-12: zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir zhe sdang ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-13: sred pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-15: gti mug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-17: sred pas gos pa'i sems spangs nas chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-19: 'dod chags kyi phyir slob pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401a-20: zhe sdang gi phyir slob pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-0: gti mug gi phyir slob pa ma @401b yin gyi; bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-1: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid la rgya cher slob pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-2: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bltas nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du spyad nas las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rkyen la rten nas mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-3: sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams kyang sngon gyi las kyi spyod pa'i rkyen las gyur pa yin par rig par byas nas de'i phyir rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i chos rnams la dga' zhing srid pa mi skyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-4: dge ba'i chos dang 'gal ba la yang zhe sdang mi skyed par sems yongs su sbyangs te mnar sems med par byas nas 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-5: zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-6: gti mug gi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-7: sdig pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-8: snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-11: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-12: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa; ngas ni rtag tu shes rab bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-13: tshul khrims srung ba'ang bsngags pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-14: bzod pa sgom la bsngags byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:401b-15: mang du thos pa'ang bsngags pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-1: ni dge ba'i chos spyod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-2: byams sems tshig snyan smra la bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-3: sems can la ni phan gdags phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-4: yon tan mang po ci rigs bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-5: nga ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-7: phrag dog nga rgyal g-yo sgyu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-8: 'khrug long sems can gnod byed smod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-9: le lo dang ni snyoms las dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-10: bka' blo mi bde smra dga' dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-11: byas pa mi gzo lam log can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-12: nyes pa chung la cher khro dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-13: rnyed pa la ni gdu ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-14: bdag ni rnyed par rab dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-15: gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-16: 'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-17: blo chung rnyed pa dag 'dod che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-18: gzhan gyi rnyed la phrag dog che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-19: gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-20: 'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-21: rnyed pa dag ni tshol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-22: spyod lam dag ni chos byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-24: nga yi chos las shin tu ring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-25: lam mi sgom pa dag la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-26: nyes pa 'di dag thams cad yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-28: dngos po 'ga' yang bsngags su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-29: sdig pa dag lta ma spangs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-30: 'dod sred sems ni rab tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-31: 'dod sred sems ni mang ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-32: rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402a-33: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-0: bzod @402b sgom sems can phan gdags shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-1: khengs pa'i sems ni rab btul nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-2: myur du sangs rgyas bya bar gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-3: bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-4: bzod pas sems can brtse bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-5: chos rnams stong zhing rkyen las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-6: 'bral ba med par shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-7: rkyen gang gis ni chos rnams yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-8: chos de sems las byung ba yin; ;mi bden 'du shes khong khro bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-9: mkhas pa thams cad stong pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-10: mi bden 'du shes khams gsum bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-12: mi bden 'du shes mi rtog na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-14: rtag tu chos rnams sems pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-15: rkyen las byung ba rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-16: rtag tu chos rnams stong lta bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-17: thams cad yongs su bzlog par nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-18: khrims spangs sems can sdug bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-19: nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-20: sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i chos ston pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-21: phan pa mang po rab tu byed; ;gang zhig shar lho nub byang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-22: phyogs mtshams bzhi po dag nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-23: mi gtsang dug gi bum thogs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-24: mgo yi steng du blugs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-25: sus byin sus ni lan byed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-26: bdag ni khong khro yong mi bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-27: chos gang zhig ni bdag yin zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-28: brtags nas brtson 'grus brtson par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:402b-29: nyes pa ci yod gnod byas zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-1: sems gzhan la lta mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-2: shin tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-3: byams sems de la phan 'dogs byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-4: sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-5: rnam smin 'di myong snyam du sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-6: dang du blangs te bzod byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-7: byang chub lam la gnas par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-8: smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-9: gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin gyi; ;'di ni nges par las kyi rkyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-10: yun ring lon kyang chud mi za //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-11: sems can 'jig rten gnas pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-12: rtag tu dge sdig las slong pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-13: deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di myong yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-14: las rkyen yin par rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-15: gal te ngan pas las byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-16: phyis kyang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-17: ci'i phyir dngos po ngan pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-18: de dag la ni gnod bya snyam; ;bla na med pa'i chos gnyer nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-19: gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-20: sems can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-21: thams cad las ni thar par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-22: gal te 'ga' zhig me tog spos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-23: phreng ba dag gis bdag mchod kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-24: rjes su chags pa mi skyed par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-25: mnyam par sgom pa bsgrub bya snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-26: byams sdang dag ni lam min pas; ;rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-27: sus byin sus ni len byed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-28: chos rnams yang dag rtog par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403a-29: stong pas byin zhing stong len na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-0: phyi nang gnyi @403b ga stong pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-1: stong la byin dang len med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-2: thams cad kun la bdag med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-3: stong la 'dod chags bral ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-4: stong la kun nas nyon mongs med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-5: rnam par byang ba'ang med pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-6: dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-7: stong la rnam par rtog pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-8: stong la ngo bo nyid rnams med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-9: stong ni rtag stong mtshan ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-10: de ni rnam dag lam yin no; ;gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-11: lus ni dum bur bcad gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-12: las kyi rkyen las byung rig pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-13: de la zhe sdang yong mi bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-14: sems can dge sdig slong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-15: las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-16: bdag kyang nges par snga ma'i sdig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-17: sdug bsngal rnam smin 'di myong snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-18: sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-19: lus btags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-20: sgyu ma sprul pa smig rgyu 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-21: stong zhing med pas mtha' yang stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-22: kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-23: kha cig drin ni dran gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-24: mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-25: dga' dang mi dga' yong mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-26: rnyed pa thob kyang dga' ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-27: kha ngan byas kyang khong mi khro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-28: 'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-29: sangs rgyas yang dag lam min sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-30: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-31: de dag thams cad spong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:403b-32: rtag tu stong dben bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-2: bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-4: thogs med ye shes snying rje yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-5: rtse ba dag ni bzod pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-6: bden bzhi dran dang yang dag spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-7: dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-8: thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-9: mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi sgom; ;ngas kyang w'a ra n'a sir ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-10: bla med 'khor lo bskor ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-11: bzod pa dag gis gzhi byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-12: sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-13: khyed kyang stong bzod bla med gzhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-14: yongs su sgom par byed na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-15: chos kyi chos nyid de yin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-16: sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-19: 'dod pa lnga po dag spangs nas rtag par rab tu 'byung bar mos pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-20: sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-21: rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol bar byed pas 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-22: rab tu byung nas kyang 'du 'dzin rnams spangs nas shin tu thag ring pa'i ri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-23: nags tshal dben pa dag tu gnas shing dge ba'i chos chud mi za bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404a-24: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-0: yon @404b tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-1: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-2: rab tu byung la rtag mos pas; ;rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-3: ri dang nags tshal gnas mos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-5: dben par gnas la brten byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-6: 'dod lnga'i chags pa yongs su spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-8: dge chos rkyen ni nyams mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-10: tshig gis smra bar byed pas na; ;stong dben nyer zhi dben pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-12: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-13: rtag par dgon pa bsten bya zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-14: grong khyer la ni chags mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-15: bsten na rnyed sems skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-16: rnyed pa thob na rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-17: stong par gyur na mya ngan skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-18: de yis sangs rgyas mchod byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-19: mchod pa byas zhes mi brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-21: rnyed pa rnams ni spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-22: spangs nas gnas dben rab gnas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-23: stong pa'i chos ni bsgom par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:404b-26: rtag par chos gnyer ba yongs su slob par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-0: yongs su gnyer nas kyang klog cig kha ton du @405a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-1: bton nas 'di ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-2: sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-4: chog mi shes pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-5: 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-6: 'dod chags rgyas par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-7: zhe sdang gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-8: zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-9: gti mug gcod pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-10: gti mug skye bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-11: khengs pa bcom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-12: khengs pa slong ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-13: nga rgyal gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-14: nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-15: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos spong ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-16: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-17: bdag med pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-21: srog la gnas pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405a-22: rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-0: shes rab chen po nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi @405b byed do; ;rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-1: shes rab rgya chung ngu thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-2: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yongs su tshol bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-3: yon tan rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-4: de ltar mos yongs su btsal nas kyang klog par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-6: tshul bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-7: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-9: gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang 'jig rten pa'i khe dang grags pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-11: zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa tsam yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed pas sems can mang po chos de la dgod par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-14: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-15: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rab byung ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-17: tshul khrims sbyangs pa dag la mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:405b-18: des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-1: byed; ;rnam dag chos zab de thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-2: yang dag dran pas don sems byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-3: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-4: de bzhin yang dag sgrub par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-5: rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-6: gzhan la rgya cher rab bstan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-7: sems can mang la phan 'dogs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-8: sems la re ba cung zad med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-9: yon tan rnams kyi ro rnyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-10: bdag nyid chos de rab gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-11: gzhan yang de la 'god byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-13: bskal pa tshad med rnams su ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-14: yon tan mang po ci bsags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-15: thams cad mngon du gyur nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-17: de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-18: chos zab dag ni yongs btsal nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-19: rtag par sems can brtan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-20: yon tan rnams ni de las skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-0: gang po; sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba de'i @406b tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me ro gandha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-6: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-7: tshe lo drug cu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-8: 'dus pa re re la chos bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-9: gang po; de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-10: lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu zhag bdun tshun chad nyan thos chen po ji snyed pa phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to; ;gang po; de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nga ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-12: nyan thos chen po rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe skye bo rnams phal cher 'di snyam du dge sbyong gi chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:406b-13: rab tu bde zhing skyid pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-0: bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung @407a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-1: snyam du bsam nas so so nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-2: rab tu byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim pa'i khyim du 'gro zhing 'dul bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-3: rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid tshol bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-4: bdag nyid nyam 'tshag tsho ba 'ba' zhig tu sbyor zhing bsod nams dang ye shes dang mi ldan pa 'ba' zhig spyod par gyur pas dngos po gsum po 'di 'ba' zhig spyod par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-6: mngon par mi sgrub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-7: lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ma lus par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-8: dge slong mang po de dag khyim rnams dang mthun par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-10: sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-11: phal cher spangs nas su yang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-13: de'i tshe dge slong rnams 'dod pa mang po dag la spyod par mos shing bza' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407a-14: btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-0: de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu da ma shi ri zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams @407b shing gces par byed pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-1: des gnas dben pa zhig tu gnas nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-2: deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag med par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems shing the tshom du gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-3: de'i tshe lha zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi snang bar byas te 'di skad du kye rgyal bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas brnyes pa'i chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-5: shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-6: zhes smras so; ;de nas rgyal bu des lhas de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-8: kye de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges par gyur pa'i chos kyi dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-16: rnam par shes pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas de lta bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa brnyes pa sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:407b-23: de nas rgyal bu des lha de la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-1: gis de lta bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par gyur nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub tu rung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-4: khyod sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus byos shig dang thob par dka' ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-6: de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-7: bdag khong du chud par byas nas bdag rab tu byung nas chos zab mo de yongs su gnyer bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-8: snyam du bsam nas pha ma ga la ba der song ste ma gos gtugs te phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-13: khyod deng nged spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-14: da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-15: khyim pa rnams dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-16: de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-17: de ltar dge slong mang po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-18: bag med 'dod pa lnga yang spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-19: zhing rmod nyo tshong byed pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-20: khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-21: dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-22: bdag nyid gso bar mi nus pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-23: de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408a-24: lus gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-0: khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du @408b skyes; ;phyug cing 'dod lnga'i bde ba myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-1: nor dang rin chen rab mang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-2: rab tu byung bas ri zhig bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-3: de nas rgyal bu da ma shi ris pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-4: bdag ni dbang phyug gi tshol te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-5: gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-6: deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-7: rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' zhig tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-8: lha zhig bdag ni go bgyis te; ;rab tu 'byung bar bskul bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-9: sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i zab mo chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-10: bdag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-11: lhas smras bdag gis thos pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-12: sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-13: sangs rgyas bstan pa nub tu nye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-14: bdag ni grogs bgyis srung bar sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-15: de nas pha mas tshigs su bcad de da ma shi ri la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-16: mdo sde zab mo zad nub pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-17: kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-18: de ring khyod kyis su las ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-19: sangs rgyas chos zab thos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-20: gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-21: don zab 'don pa yod gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-22: de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-24: da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de pha ma la slar smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-25: deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-26: tshul khrims srung zhing sbyangs pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-27: thag ring ri dang nags tshal nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:408b-28: sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-0: da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad pa @409a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-1: 'di smras nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba byas te rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-2: pha ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-3: de nas dge slong rnams kyi thad du song nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smig bgos nas rab tu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-4: bslab pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-5: bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-8: dge slong mang po rnams kyis dge slong da ma shi ri la 'di skad ces smras so;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-9: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-11: mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-12: deng khyod kyang 'di lta bu'i chos la spyod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-13: de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409a-15: gdon mi za bar dbul po dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas; de'i phyir deng khyed gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas spyod pa rnams khyim pa dag dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-0: deng khyed bdag dang lhan cig tu @409b sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-1: de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de dge slong da ma shi ri la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-2: bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrubs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-3: dngos po de ni thob gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-4: gos zas dag ni 'byor cing ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-5: rgyal pos bkol pa las kyang thar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-6: shin tu bde zhing rab tu skyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-7: brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-8: khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-9: de dag da ltar gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-11: mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-12: dngos po 'di las lhag par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-13: bdag cag la ni dgos pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-14: khyim pas rtag tu sbyor 'bul bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-15: bdag cag chos gos lhung bzed mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-16: sman dang nor zas shin tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-17: sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-19: de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-20: sems la rab tu gdung ba skyes nas mchi ma blags te dus nas gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-21: yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:409b-22: bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-2: dge slong mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-3: de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po de dag spangs nas gcig pu ri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-4: nags tshal dben par song nas sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba la 'dun par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-5: de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben pa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-6: 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-7: yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-9: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-10: rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-11: ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-12: de'i tshe dge slong shin tu brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri phug gi brag ros la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-14: 'dod pa'i ro ni myangs pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-15: 'khor ba dag ni rgyun mi gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-16: dgra ni gsos nas dur khrod 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-17: don med sdug bsngal mang po myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-18: lus ni mi gtsang ro dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-19: bu ga dgu nas mi gtsang 'dzag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410a-20: srin bu mi gtsang mos pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-0: @410b blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-1: yang dag ma yin kun rtog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-2: de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-3: mkhas pa dag ni mi rtog pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-5: log rtog las ni 'dod chen skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-6: 'dod chen las ni nyon mongs skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-7: yang dag dran la zhen med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-8: nyon mongs lhag ma'ang zad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-11: dge slong shin tu brtan pas ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa dge slong da ma shi ri ri phug dben par song bas yun ring zhig lon nas ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong nas kha ton du bslab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-12: de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pas ring po ma lon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas sngon zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas su phyin nas phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas skyil mo klung bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bdag gis gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:410b-14: chos gzhan yang ma thos kyi bar du 'di las mi ldang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton du shes @411a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-1: pas; brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dge slong da ma shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te; de'i drung du phyin nas de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-2: gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i dngos gzhi'i tshig bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-4: sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-5: dge slong da ma shi ris thos nas kyang kha ton du bton te yongs su bzung bas chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandhas gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-6: bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-7: zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis sems la snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-8: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411a-9: bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-0: mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar @411b gyur to; ;dge slong da ma shi ri yang chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar gyis rang gi yul du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-1: pha ma'i drung du phyin nas pha ma la yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-2: bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-3: zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-5: dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-7: de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri'i pha ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-10: 'khor rnams kyis chos de thos nas shin tu mngon par yid ches par gyur pas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong da ma shi ri la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-12: bdag cag yongs su bskyab cing de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-13: btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i rjes su dus gcig tu rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-14: rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi ri'i tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:411b-16: dge slong da ma shi ris de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas sems can mang po de dag bde ba la yang dag par bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-0: sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams @412a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-2: snying rje chen po'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos srung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri ljongs gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-3: grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-4: yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-5: de'i nyan thos kyi bsngags pa yang brjod; gzhan yang yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-6: bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-7: zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-8: de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri yang skye bo mang po kun gyis mchod cing rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-10: bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pas snyan pa'i grags pa yang kun tu grags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-12: dge slong da ma shi ris de ltar sems can mang po'i don rgya cher byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-13: de'i slob ma dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412a-16: dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig tu 'dus te spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gnyis yod pa brtsigs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-4: ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-5: bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-6: gang po; dge slong da ma shi ri 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-7: smon lam btab pa bzhin du rgyal rigs su skyes nas dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu lo sum brgya lon pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-10: tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis slar thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-11: gzungs thob pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-12: tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-15: de'i tshe da ma shi ri dge slong mang po rnams las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:412b-17: dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thos par gyur nas sems kyi rjes su yi rang nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-0: gus pas mchod par byas nas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang yongs su srung @413a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-2: dge slong de dag las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-3: dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-5: dge slong dran pa thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur nas mngon par yid ches pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-6: dang du len pa yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-7: 'gal ba dag byas nas skyon 'byin cing 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-8: bdag cag gis mkhan po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-9: slob dpon las kyang ma thos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-10: sngon slob dpon chen po da ma shi ri las kyang ma thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-13: de dag las gang shes rab zab cing yang dag pa'i don la rton pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-14: tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang bar don la rton pa'i phyir sems kyis kyang 'gal bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-15: 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa yang yang dag par srung bar byed la /
