K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-16: gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang srung bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413a-21: dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dge slong dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-0: de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri'i slob ma 'khor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyis su @413b gyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-2: da ma shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-4: dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-5: da ma shi ri yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-9: de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-10: mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-13: zhes zer bas gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-14: mang po kun the tshom za bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-15: dge slong dran pa thob pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-16: de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-17: byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-21: gang po; dge slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan btags nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-22: de'i slob ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:413b-23: 'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus te ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-2: ba dan sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-3: bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-4: gang po; dge slong dran pa thob pa 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe bdag slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-5: ces smon lam btab pas smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-7: ya sha zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-8: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo bzhi brgya pa'i bstan pa la lo bdun lon te rab tu byung nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-10: gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-11: de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-12: da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414a-13: ya shas bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas sems rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-0: dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i don la rten cing tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar cang mi @414b byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-1: de'i phyir dge slong ya shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa yang dag par bstan pa thos par gyur nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-2: 'gal ba med par yang dag par len cing kha ton du 'don par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-3: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-5: dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun mi stug pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-7: dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-8: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa dag thos par gyur nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-9: 'gal bar byas nas 'jig cing smod par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-10: 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-11: bdag cag gis mkhan po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-12: slob dpon las kyang ma thos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-13: sngon ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-16: dge slong ya sha las chos thos nas rab tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-17: sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:414b-18: da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-0: dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis @415a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-1: sdang zhing phrag dog gis smad nas lhan cig gnas su yang mi ster /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-4: chos bshad du yang mi ster te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-5: skur pa btab nas 'di skad du 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-7: ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-10: de'i tshe dge slong ya shas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par spel nas grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas sems can rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-11: srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-12: dge slong ya shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-13: dge slong ya sha'i rjes su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten bdun khri brtsigs nas spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-20: ba dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415a-21: bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-0: dge slong ya shas 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe @415b slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-1: ces smon lam btab pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu smon lam btab pa bzhin du yang rgyal rigs su skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-2: de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis sgra chen po phyung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-3: 'di skad du kye deng rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-4: sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-6: sgra de'i rjes su ming yang rab tu 'dren pa zhes btags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-7: de lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga brgya pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-9: dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de yang mdo sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-10: bstan bcos mang po rgya cher kha ton du 'don pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-11: mang du thos shing zab mo la 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-13: spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-14: chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu mkhas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-16: dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-17: grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-18: yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-19: de'i tshe da ma sha ri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:415b-21: ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thad du 'ongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-1: gzhig cing skur pa gdab par bshams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-2: de nas de'i tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs par rig nas 'di skad du kye dge slong mang po khyed dngos po ci zhig gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-5: 'dri bar sems zhes smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-6: dge slong mang po rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan gyis non cing mi bde bar gyur pas cang mi zer bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-7: dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de ji srid du 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-10: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-11: dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i tshe grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-12: grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416a-13: yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas sems can mang po'i ched du yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-0: de dag @416b 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams cad kyang mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-2: dge slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyi de nyin par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gandha'i bstan pa nub par gyur ba'i phyir mdo sde zab mo yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-6: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni; mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu zhing de nyid kyi steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-9: de'i tshe zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-11: de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe rabs snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-12: bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:416b-13: spobs pa gtugs pa med cing myur la thogs pa med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417a-0: @417a *// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417a-1: slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phel zhing dpung pa zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417a-3: de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa dang phrad par gyur te; sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lo bdun khri'i bar du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa des 'di skad du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @417b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-4: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-5: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-6: byang chub sems dpa' zab mo yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-7: rnam dag nges pa'i chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-8: bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-9: gzhan dag la yang ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-10: 'jig rten gting ni mi dpog kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-11: byang chub sems dpa' bying mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-12: tshul khrims rnam dag rab gnas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-13: rgya cher sems can phan yang 'dogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-14: gleng gzhi dang ni rtogs pa brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-15: sangs rgyas lam shes 'khor la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-16: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-17: 'di ni nges pa'i chos yin no; ;byang chub sems dpa' phan spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-18: sems can la ni phan yang 'dogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-19: sangs rgyas chos rnams srung byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-21: sems can dag gi chos bzhin don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-23: 'khor la sangs rgyas lam ston pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:417b-24: byang chub sems ni nye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-2: sems can rgya cher phan 'dogs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-3: lha dang klu dang 'dre srin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-4: gang zag chen pos bkur bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-5: de'i phyir rnam par dag pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-6: stong zab gya nom chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-7: rtse gcig sems shing gnyer byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-11: spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-12: spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-13: de la spyod pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-20: bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-21: shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa sgom par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418a-23: byang chub sems dpa' gang las mdo sde de lta bu dag rjes su bstan pa'i thabs mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-0: lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub don du gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @418b thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-3: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-4: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-5: ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-6: spyad par bya bya'i chos dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-7: sbyin pa btang nas rab dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-8: 'gyod pa med pa yin zhes bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-9: de la dga' ba gang zhe na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-10: dga' bas lus kun khyab pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-11: rtag tu dga' sems 'di yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-12: byang chub lam ni spyad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-13: byang chub sems dpas sbyin btang nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-14: byang chub tu ni bsngo byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-15: sems can rnams la phan 'dogs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-16: rang don dpag med thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-17: slong ba dag ni mthong 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-18: sangs rgyas 'du shes rab bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-20: bdag la byang chub lam yang sbyin; ;bdag ni 'di yi dbang gis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-21: rnam dag zhing ni thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-22: 'di yis bdag la sangs rgyas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-23: bdag la sangs rgyas lam ston byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-24: deng bdag 'di dang phrad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-25: rnyed pa chen po rab rnyed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-26: dga' bas lus kun khyab nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-27: dngos po gzhan la mos mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:418b-28: dga' zhing drung du 'ongs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-2: khyod ni dngos po ci zhig 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-3: bdag gis zad par sbyin zhes zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-4: gal te dgos pa med zer na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-7: dngos po med ces zer bar zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-9: 'dod nyung chog shes chos kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-11: byang chub rkyen ni thob par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-12: deng bdag gang zag 'di yi rgyus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-13: rjes su bstan pa'i chos kyang thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-14: khyod kyis dgos med gang smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-15: tshig 'di legs pa yin zhes zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-17: bdag la byin cig zer na yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-18: byang chub sems dpas ci bdog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-19: thams cad dga' bar khyer ces zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-20: gal te sbyin pa btang nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-21: phyis kyang 'gyod pa med gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-22: sangs rgyas lam ni dran pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-23: sems ni rtag tu dga' ba thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-24: sems can kun la skal yod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-25: thams cad phongs pa med 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-26: ma lus thams cad tshim bya zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-27: sbyin pa gtong tshe bsngo bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-28: byang chub lam ni spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-29: sems can bdag gi ming thos pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-30: rang gi ngang gis chog shes shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419a-31: ser sna chags sems med par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-0: bdag gis @419b yul gyi sems can kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-1: lam spyod thams cad chog shes shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-2: 'dod lnga chags pa kun spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-3: thams cad rab 'byung mos par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-4: de 'dra'i spyod pa tshad med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-5: sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-6: rtag par sbyin pa rab gtong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-7: sems can bdag rjes slob par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-8: byang chub sems dpas sbyin gtong tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-9: byams sems sems can khyab pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-10: 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-11: de 'dra'i bde ba yong med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-12: dper na khyim thab phyug po zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-13: nor dang rin chen shin tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-14: bu ni gcig cig yod pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-15: lo ni mang por lam ring song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-16: khyim bdag bu 'ongs thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-17: dga' bas lus kun khyab 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-18: yun ring lon nas deng 'ong shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-19: de gdod btsas bzhin rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-20: byang chub sems dpas slong mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-21: de yi sems ni rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-22: khyim bdag de yi dga' bas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-23: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-24: sbyin pa gtong bar thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-25: de yi sems ni rab dga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-26: byams sems las byung dga' ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-27: dpe zla dag ni yong med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-28: ji ltar rgyal pos nyes byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-29: yan lag gtubs zhes bsgo bas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-30: gsod pas gsad gnas khrid nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:419b-31: mtshon gyis gdab par gzas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-2: mi de'i rab tu dga' bas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-3: byang chub sems dpa' phongs pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-4: sbyin btang dga' ba tsam mi phod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-5: byang chub sems dpa' lam sgom tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-6: bsod nams zhing ni mi tshol gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-7: slong ba yod na gtong byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-8: de phyir dga' ba chen po thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-10: dgra bcom rang rgyal mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-11: gus sems phrad dka' rig pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-12: de phyir drung 'gro mchod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-13: byang chub sems dpa' gzi byin ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-14: gsal rno sems ni dul pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-15: yon tan mos shing lam gnyer phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-16: sangs rgyas dge 'dun mchod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-18: de yi nyan thos ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-19: lhag pa'i bsam dang gus sems kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-20: lha 'dre gzhan ni mchod mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-21: gal te rang rgyal 'ga' zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-22: rang byung mya ngan 'das pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-23: nges pa'i yon tan ldan mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-24: de la yang ni mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-25: byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-26: dge dang mi dge rig pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-27: 'jig rten mkhas pa gang yin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-28: mu stegs sdig can mchod mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-29: tshul khrims phyogs la rab gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420a-30: byams sems sems can kun la khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-0: brtson 'grus dag @420b kyang dpe zla med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-1: bzod shes mang thos rgya yang che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-2: de 'dra'i yon tan ldan pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-3: 'jig rten kun gyi gtsor gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-4: sangs rgyas byang chub mngon byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-5: bla med 'khor lo bskor bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-7: chos bzhi dag ni sgrub byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-9: thams cad kun ni mngon du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-10: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-11: yon tan dag ni gang bsgrubs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-12: de kun byang chub sems dpa'i lam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-13: 'dir ni bsdu bar bya ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-14: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-15: rtag tu byams sems bsgom par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-16: rab byung ri dang tshal gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-17: dgon pa'i gnas la mos par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-18: rtag par shin tu rnam dag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-19: zab mo nges pa'i chos btsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-20: byang chub spyod dang ldan byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-21: de yi bdag nyid 'phel bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-24: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:420b-25: gzhan yang ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kun nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i phung po ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa dag byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-0: gzhan yang ba spu'i bu ga re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed @421a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-2: 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bstan pa mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mngon du mdzad nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-5: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-11: rtag par 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pas rgyun chad pa med pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu bzhugs nas chos 'chad par mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-15: yang dag par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun tu rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-16: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin du chos ston par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-18: gal te 'ga' zhig yang dag pa'i tshig gis 'di skad du mtshungs pa med cing dpe zla med pa rkang gnyis kyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-20: shin tu zab cing dpag par dka' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-21: spyod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421a-22: gom pa gcig bor na yang sems can thams cad kyi sems gang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-0: spyod pa gang @421b gis rkang pa bteg cing bzhag pa shes par yang mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-1: gzhal bar mi nus pa de gang yin zhes zer na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-6: sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa gang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-8: spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-9: zhabs bzhag pa gzhal bar mi nus pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-10: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-11: bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa gang dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-12: spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-13: g-yo dang mi g-yo sems can gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-14: dngos po 'di ni rtag mi rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-15: rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tshad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-16: spyod pa dag kyang tshad med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-17: yon tan dag ni tshad med phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-18: mchog tu mtho zhing gtso bor 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-19: blo gros chen po tshad med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-20: sus kyang mthar thug shes mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-21: gal te sems can thams cad kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-22: shes rab dang ni rdzu 'phrul stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-23: thams cad sh'a ri'i bu dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-24: moo dgal lta bur gyur kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-25: nga yis rkang pa bteg bzhag pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-26: dngos po dag ni rig mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-27: gal te sems can thams cad kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-28: rang rgyal byang chub grub gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-29: nga yi gom gcig mi rig na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-30: chos zab gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:421b-31: nyi zla tshad med ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu khung gcig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-3: 'od zer tsam yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-4: gal te 'jig rten khams bye pa;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-5: khrag khrig phrag ni bdun khri yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-6: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-7: zhing ni tshad med snang byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-8: de 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-9: phyogs bcu gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-10: thams cad nyi ma gcig tu gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-11: 'od zer gcig kyang ri rab tsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-12: de 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-13: rtag par phyogs bcu gsal byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-14: sangs rgyas 'od dang bsgrun gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-15: sdong po tshig bzhin snang mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-16: nyi ma chen po de yi 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-17: ljon shing lo ma mi thal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-18: ri dang klung dang brag rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-19: thams cad du ni thogs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-21: ri rab dang ni lcags ri dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-22: rdo rje'i ri ni thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-23: thal bar 'gro zhing thogs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-25: gzi byin dag ni tshad med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-26: yid ches med pa ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-27: mthong ba su zhig sems mi bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-29: rdzu 'phrul chen po mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-30: bdag cag kyang ni thob 'gyur zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-31: phal cher bla med sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-32: de tshe bcom ldan 'dzum mdzad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422a-33: kun dga' bos ni 'di skad gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-0: gang slad bcom @422b ldan 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-1: thogs med mkhyen pas bka' bshad gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-2: bcom ldan kun dga' bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-3: sems can rnams kyis deng nga yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-4: rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs mthong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-5: sems bskyed sangs rgyas grub par smon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-7: chos 'di srung bar dam yang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-8: bdag cag sangs rgyas 'das 'og tu; ;mdo sde 'di ni gdon bya sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-10: mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-11: bar dang tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-12: ji skad bstan bzhin sgrub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-13: byang chub sems bskyed shin tu dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-14: sangs rgyas chos mos ba yang dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-15: tha ma'i dus tshe mdo sde 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-17: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-18: sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-19: ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-20: mdo sde 'di bshad de bas dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-23: ngas mdo sde 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:422b-25: 'dzam bu'i gling na ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gnas par 'gyur bas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-0: 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo 'di nub par gyur pa'i phyir ji skad bstan pa bzhin du @423a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-1: mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-2: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-4: deng khyod kyis mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-5: ji ltar na nyan thos rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par 'gyur zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-6: khyod kyis 'di snyam du me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-14: rol mo sil snyan mchog dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-16: mchod pa mchog dam pa yin no; ;snyam du bsam par mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-18: de lta bu de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-19: mchod pa dam pa zhes mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-20: gang gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di thos nas len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-24: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-25: mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423a-28: bsngags pa brjod par byas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-0: de ci'i phyir zhe @423b na; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos la mchod cing rim gro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-2: 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-3: btsun par mi mdzad pas so; ;de lta bas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-5: deng mdo sde 'di nan tan brtson 'grus kyis khyod la yongs su gtad pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-8: ngas kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslab pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-9: deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-10: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslab pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-12: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:423b-13: bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-0: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde @424a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas deng chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar mdzad pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-6: ngas yul w'a ra n'a si'i ri dvags rgyu ba'i tshal du yang nyan thos rnams la 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-8: ngas deng 'od ma'i tshal 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'di yongs su bskor nas sems can thams cad kyi the tshom yongs su bcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-10: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424a-11: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rnam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsungs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-0: ngas deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i @424b sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par bshad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten chen po lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa'i bya ba'i gnas su gyur par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-4: sa gzhi 'di 'ba' zhig thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-5: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dir mdo sde zab mo 'di yang dag par gsungs pa dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-9: gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'od ma'i tshal 'dir zhugs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-12: gti mug slong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang gzhan na yang zhugs par gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-15: de dag gang la yang 'di lta bu'i yon tan med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-18: ka landa ka dang 'od ma'i tshal 'dir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag zhugs par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-20: bya mang po zhugs par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:424b-21: dus ma yin par sgra mi 'byin pas so; ;ji ltar zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-0: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas dang po rgyal sar zhugs pa'i tshe btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te skyed @425a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-1: mos tshal 'dir zhugs nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byas pa las zhugs ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags kyi rtsed mo byas pa'i bsam pa med par gyur par tshor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-2: btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang so so nas 'dod chags kyi sems kyis rtsed mo bya ba'i bsam pa med par gyur par tshor bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-3: de'i tshe rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bdag gi yul du byung bar gyur nas bdag gis mthong bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-4: mthong nas kyang sems kyis mngon par yid ches par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-5: mngon par yid ches par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-6: skyed mos tshal 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dir zhugs par gyur nas bdag chos thos par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-10: mchod gnas su gyur pa dag gi gnas yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-11: 'dod pa lnga dang ma bral ba dag gi gnas ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425a-14: rgyal po gzugs can snying po skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-0: de lta bu'i dge ba'i sems skyes pa yang 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs @425b nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gsungs pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-1: de'i phyir skyed mos tshal 'di'i yon tan ji snyed yod pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-2: gzhan dag dang thun mong du ma gyur pas lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-4: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis gus pas phyag byed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-10: sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-11: gal te gnas par gyur na yang gdug pa'i sems med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-12: 'di yang 'od ma'i tshal gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-13: gal te lo brgya'i bar du tshal 'di'i yon tan na brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-16: 'od ma'i tshal gyi dri gtsang khang 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-17: yon tan tshad med pa snyed dang ldan gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-19: de lta ma yin pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-20: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-21: bdag gis sngon 'od ma'i tshal 'di 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ma 'tshal lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-23: bdag gis sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring bgyi bar ma mos pa'i sdig pa gang lags pa deng bdag bshags par 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:425b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-1: dang po chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur pa de nyid kyi tshe sdig pa de dag byang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moong gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-5: bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams legs par ston par mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-7: bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-8: de ci'i phyir zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs par sgrub cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-9: skye 'gag med pa'i don sems can gyis khong du chud par byed pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-10: snyam mo; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moong gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa moong gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-15: gal te nga'i nyan thos gang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i don thos par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426a-16: sems myos myos por 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-0: de bzhin gshegs @426b pa'i thugs rje chen po lta re zhig zhog gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-1: ngas gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po ji snyed cig dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs pa brjod par gyur na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-2: khyod kyi sems myos myos por 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa moong gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-5: bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe thugs rje chen po ji lta bu mnga' ba las phyogs cung zad tsam zhig bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-8: shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-9: khyod la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po las phyogs cung zad cig dpes bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-10: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-11: snying rje chen po ji snyed cig spyad pa brjod pas ma lang mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-12: snying rje chen po de ni dngos po rnam pa bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:426b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du snying rje chen po la gnas pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-0: nga ni sngon sems can rnams la 'di lta @427a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-1: bu'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-2: 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-3: sems can ji snyed cig sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-4: sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-10: rab tu tsha ba dag na sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dag la yang ngas rtag tu sems can de dag gi ched du sems can dmyal ba chen po na sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag sdig pa'i las ma byang ba de srid du sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur kyang sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-12: gal te sems can gyi don du gyur pa'i rgyu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-13: rkyen ci yod par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-14: ngas de dag thams cad dang du blangs nas sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar par byas nas nga nyid sdug bsngal dang du len par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-15: sems can gcig gi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i las mthar thug pa'i bar du dang du blangs kyang de'i tshe nga'i sems la 'gyod pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427a-19: brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas blo dang ldan pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-1: de'i nyan thos dag la 'di ltar rigs pa'i tshul 'dri ba'i rgyu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-3: sdug bsngal dang du blangs nas sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba yas thar par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-5: mkhas pa dag gis thos par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-6: nga'i ming du thos pa'i bsngags pa brjod do /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sbyin pa gtong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-13: ngas de lta bu thos nas brtson 'grus chen po bskyed de chos yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa chen po thob par bya ba'i ched du brtson 'grus brtsams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i ched du bzod pa yongs su bsgoms so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-16: ngas sngon ji ltar bzod pa yongs su bsgoms she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-17: sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-18: 'di ltar sems bskyed de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i sems can ji snyed pa gzugs can nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:427b-22: 'du shes med 'du shes med min yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-0: sems can de dag thams cad ma lus @428a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-1: par mi'i lus thob par gyur nas thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs te 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-2: kye khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-3: bdag cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-4: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis mang du phongs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-5: khyod gal te bdag cag la sbyin par mi nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-7: zhes sems can de dag gis de'i tshe tshig brlang pos brgyad bkag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-8: mi bden pas skyon smos pas yid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ral gri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-10: gyo mo dag gis bdag gi lus la gnod pa byas kyang bdag de'i tshe'i zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-11: 'gyod pa mi bskyed par bdag gis 'di ltar sems rab tu gdul bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-12: sems can 'di dag ni glen zhing gti mug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-13: shes pa med pas gti mug gi las byed pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-14: gal te bdag gis kyang sems can glen zhing gti mug pa 'di dag la zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-15: 'khon du 'dzin pa bskyed par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-16: 'o na ni bdag 'di dag dang tha dad pa yang ci yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428a-17: 'di dag ni lam du ma zhugs pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-0: bde ba ni dge ba'i lam du zhugs pa yin pas deng bdag gi sems can 'di dag @428b las sdug bsngal dang du blangs te zhe sdang gi bsam pa mi bskyed par sa chen po bzhin du bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-3: nga sngon bzod pa 'di lta bu yongs su bsgoms so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-5: ngas ni yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du bltas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-8: khyim bdag shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-9: rin po che rab tu mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-12: las byed pa dang ldan pa zhig yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-13: de brtul zhugs rnam pa rgya spyad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-14: bu zhig rnyed par gyur nas sems la sdug cing blta bas mi ngoms par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-16: khyim bdag de ni rtag par bu de'i legs pa'i dngos po tshol bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-17: rtag par legs pa'i dngos po sbyin par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-18: rtag par phan pa sbyin par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-20: phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-22: nga yang yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta bar byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-23: ngas yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la legs pa'i dngos po yongs su btsal nas phan 'dogs par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-25: phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:428b-27: ngas ni yun ring po nas lam nor ba'i sems can rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-0: lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams @429a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-1: la yang dag pa'i lam bstan nas yang dag pa'i lam la yang dag par rab tu bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-5: yun ring po nas sems can rnams la shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas bu gcig pa brtse zhing phangs pa la lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-7: sngon 'das pa'i dus na tshong pa phal po che zhig mtshan mo lam du zhugs te dong ba las lam stor nas lam gol par zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-8: mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pa'i phyir gar 'gro ba mi shes nas thams cad kyis 'di skad du bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-13: sems can rnams la su zhig lha'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-17: mi ma yin pa gang zhig bdag cag la lam bstan nas lam ma nor ba thob par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-18: su zhig bdag cag la snying brtse bas phan 'dogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-19: mtshan mo mun nag lam gol zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa 'dir snang ba sbyin par byed ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429a-21: de'i tshe dgon pa'i nags tshal zhig na mu stegs can gyi drang srong zhig rtsa'i spyil bu'i nang na 'dug pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-0: mtshan mo mun pa'i @429b nang na tshong pa mang po rnams snying rje rje skad du ngu 'bod pa'i sgra thos nas de 'di snyam du deng tshong pa mang po rnams mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-1: dgon pa'i gnas nags tshal 'dir lam stor bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-2: gal te bdag gis skyabs ma byas na tshul yang ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-3: tshong pa mang po rnams kyang stag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-8: gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gtses shing srog 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-10: de'i tshe drang srong des sgra chen po phyung ste tshong pa rnams la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-13: deng bdag gis khyed kyi skyabs bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-14: snang bas khyed la lam yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-15: zhes de'i tshe drang srong des tshong pa rnams tshig gis spro ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-16: ras kyis lag pa gnyis dkris nas 'bru mar gyis kun tu khyab par blugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-17: me sbar nas sgron ma byas te tshong pa rnams la lam bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-19: de'i tshe tshong pa rnams so so nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-20: shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:429b-21: bdag cag gi phyir lus dang srog la yang phangs pa med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-0: de'i tshe drang srong des lag pa bsregs pa'i snang bas tshong pa rnams la lam bstan nas kyang @430a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-1: sems can la snying rje cher skyes par gyur nas 'di snyam du nam bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba byas nas yang dag pa'i lam ston par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-3: mood gal; de'i tshe de'i dus na lag pa gnyis bsregs par gyur kyang lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-4: sems la 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-7: gzhan gyi don yongs su gnyer ba na lus dang srog la yang mngon par zhen pa med pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-8: bsam pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i rgyu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-9: rkyen gyis de'i lag pa yang snga mkho bzhin du gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-10: rma yang med par gyur to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-11: tshong pa rnams kyang lam rnyed par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-12: nam langs nas drang srong gis lag pa gnyis la rma yang med par mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430a-13: ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa bskyed nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-0: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas mtshan thog thag lag pa gnyis la me sbar nas bdag cag gi snang ba byas te lam yang dag par bstan kyang 'di'i lag pa tshig pa @430b ba cung zad kyang med pas gdon mi za bar 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-1: spyod pa chen po grub cing yon tan chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-3: de'i tshe tshong pa rnams kyis drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-5: khyed kyis mchog tu dka' ba spyad par gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-7: deng spyod pa 'dis dngos po gang zhig thob par smon lags; drang srong gis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-9: bdag gis dngos po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas khyed la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bzlas te lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan par smon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-10: de'i tshe tshong pa rnams sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thams cad kyis ji skad du bdag cag gis dngos po ji lta bu zhig gis drang srong 'di la lan glan par bya zhes smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-12: khyed rnams rtse gcig tu dge ba'i chos spyod pa la bag med par mi byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-13: tshong pa rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-14: zhes smras nas tshong pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing gus par phyag byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:430b-15: de nas gyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-0: khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na mu stegs can gyi drang srong tshong pa rnams kyi ched du lag pa sbar nas lam @431a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-1: snang ba byas pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-6: da ltar gyi dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-9: yun ring po nas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-10: lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-11: mig med pa'i sems can dag yongs su dag pa'i mig thob par byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-12: nad tshabs che ba'i sems can rnams gsos nas sos par byas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-13: yun ring po nas sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nad kyi bskal pa chen po byung bas sems can rnams nad kyis nyon mongs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431a-16: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dbang phyug gi sde zhes bya ba grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed cing mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung bar 'gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-0: de'i tshe rgyal po @431b de'i btsun mo dam pa sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-1: de'i lus kyi yan lag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-2: lag pas sems can rnams la reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos par gyur to; ;zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-3: btsas ma thag tu 'di skad du bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-4: nad pa rnams gso bar nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-6: gzhan yang btsas pa'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha klu rnams kyis mthun par 'di skad du deng rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-9: de skad smras pa'i sgra de kun tu grags pa'i phyir ming yang mi'i sman zhes btags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-10: de'i tshe mi rnams kyang gang nad kyis btab pa rnams khrid nas rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-11: nad pa gang rgyal bu'i drung du phyin pa de dag rgyal bu'i lag pas reg par gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-12: lus kyis reg par gyur kyang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-13: thams cad nad sos nas bde ba thob par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-14: de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa kun gyis nad pa khrid nas rgyal bu la bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-15: rgyal bu'i lag pa reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos nas mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:431b-17: rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis lo stong gi bar de ltar na dag gsos nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-0: 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu nad pa rnams der 'ongs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa @432a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-2: mya ngan dang smre sngags bton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-3: dus nas su zhig bdag cag na ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar byed ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-4: nad kyis btab pa rnams rgyal bu mi'i sman gang du bsregs pa smras nas gang du bsregs pa shes par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-5: bsregs pa'i gnas der rus pa blangs te phye mar btags nas lus la bskus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-6: thams cad nad sos par gyur nas 'di skad du rgyal bu mi'i sman da dung yang nad pa rnams gso bar nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-9: de ltar nad pa rnams gsos pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis rus pa rnams kyang mthar gyis zad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-10: rus pa rnams zad pa'i 'og tu bsregs pa'i gnas der song nas sa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-12: sol ba rnams blangs te so so nas lus la bskus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-13: nad thams cad sos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-15: de ltar rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis nad kyi bskal pa chen po byung ba na thabs mkhas pas nad kyis btab pa rnams gsos pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-17: khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu mi'i sman zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432a-21: ngas nad kyi sdug bsngal mang ba'i sems can mgon med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-0: skyabs med pa dag gi nad @432b gsos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-1: ngas deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab chen po'i sman gyis sems can rnams gsos nas sdug bsngal mthar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-4: sems can gyi ched du lus gang blangs bas phan 'dogs par gyur pa da mngon du len cing phan 'dogs par byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-7: ched du sems can gyi phyir lus blangs nas phan 'dogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-9: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe nga gcig pu grogs med par song ba las gcan gzan ma rungs pa zhig 'ongs te nga'i srog bcad nas nga'i sha bza' bar 'dod pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-10: nga 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe sems bskyed nas 'di skad du bdag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu dgon pa'i nags tshal 'dir dud 'gro lus po che zhig tu skyes nas gcan gzan ma rungs pa gang gis bdag gi srog bcad pa de dag 'grangs shing tshim par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-13: gcan gzan ma rungs pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-14: rtag par srog chags phra mo gsod cing sha za bar byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:432b-15: srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba mang du bskyed kyang 'grangs shing tshim par mi 'gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-0: ngas 'di skad du bdag 'dir dud 'gro lus @433a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-1: po cher skyes nas sha za zhing khra ga 'thung ba'i sems can rnams 'grangs shing tshim par byed par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-2: ces smon lam btab pas na; 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu der dud 'gro lus po cher rdzus te skyes nas gcan gzan ma rungs pa sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba rnams 'grangs shing tshim par byas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-3: de bzhin du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed du ched du lus blangs nas sems can rnams la phan pa byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-5: ngas gal te bskal pa gcig gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-6: bskal pa las lhag par sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can bkres shing skom pa rnams la rang gi sha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-7: khrag gis tshim par byas pa dag brjod pa na yang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-9: de ltar na ngas sngon sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i sems rab tu bskyed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-12: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe ngas sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433a-13: 'di snyam du bdag gis spangs te yongs su mi bskyab pa'i mi rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-0: snyam du bsam nas de dag gi thad du song nas 'di skad du kye khyod la sdug bsngal ji lta bu zhig @433b yod; ci zhig 'dod ces dris pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-3: shin tu bkres shing skom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-4: ngas de skad smras pa thos nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-5: khyod bza' ba dang btung ba ji lta bu zhig 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-6: de dag gis nga la bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-7: khrag 'thung zhing sha za ba yin pas gal te lus kyi sha dang khrag bdag cag la byin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-8: bdag cag gdod bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-10: ngas de dag la de bzhin du gnang nas rang nyid kyi sha bcad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-11: khrag phyung nas sems can de dag la byin yang moo dgal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-12: de'i tshe nga'i sems la 'gyod cing phangs pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-15: 'di snyam du deng bdag gis lus kyi sha ji tsam bcad pa de tsam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phyogs kyang de tsam zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-16: snyam du bsam nas ngas yun ring por rtag par de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la mos par gyur to; ;de ltar sbyin pa yongs su btang yang rab tu dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-17: rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:433b-18: sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba yon @434a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-1: tan gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-2: de'i tshe rgyal po stobs po che 'di snyam du deng bdag gis ci'i phyir mchod sbyin chen po bshams nas sems can rnams tshim par mi byed snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-3: de snyam du bsam nas mchod sbyin chen po bshams nas bza' ba 'dod pa la bza' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-4: btung ba 'dod pa la btung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-9: rin po che'i dngos po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-18: man shel la sogs pa'i rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-36: zhing gi dngos po 'dod pa dag la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' mgur spyad nas thams cad yongs su btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434a-38: rgyal po stobs po ches de ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-0: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di snyam du bdag gis ci'i phyir @434b rgyal po 'di la bar chad byas te 'bras bu mi thob par bya snyam du bsam nas de nas bram ze zhig tu sprul te rgyal bu de ga la ba der song nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces dris so; ;kye mchod sbyin chen po'i dus 'dir dngos po ji lta bu zhig yongs su gtong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-3: bdag la nor ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-4: phangs pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-6: khyed kyi yi dam de lta bu yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-7: deng bdag gis slong ba gang yin pa de sbyin par nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-8: rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-9: bdag gis ci bdog pa thams cad zad par gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-15: rgyal po'i lus kyi yan lag 'dod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-18: nor zas 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-19: deng 'dir 'ongs nas bdag gi mchod sbyin chen po gzhig par 'dod pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-20: bdag gis gal te lus kyi yan lag ma byin na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-21: bdag nyid kyis rang gi mchod sbyin chen po gzhig par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-22: snyam du bsam nas bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-23: khyed la lus kyi yan lag sbyin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:434b-27: deng de skad smras pa 'di la 'gyod par gyur pa lta med dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-0: @435a *// rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-1: bdag gi sems la 'gyod pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-2: deng slong ba mang po phyogs bzhi nas 'dus te 'ongs na yang bdag gis thams cad tshim par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-5: deng bdag gcig pu tshim par bya ba yang dka' na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-6: gzhan mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-7: de nas rgyal po stobs po ches mtshon rnon pos rang gi lag pa bcad nas bram ze la khyed kyis lag pa 'di gcig khyer cig ces smras so /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-9: rgyal po stobs po ches rang gi lag pa bcad pa'i tshe sems 'gyur zhing 'gyod pa med par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-10: de ltar sems rtse gcig tu sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-11: thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir lag pa yang snga mkho bzhin du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-12: de'i tshe rgyal po stobs po ches mtshon gyis lus kyi yan lag bcad nas bram ze la byin kyang slar skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-14: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang rgyu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-15: rkyen des na lha'i bsod nams zad nas sems yongs su gdung zhing sdug bsngal bas 'o dod chen po bos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435a-16: lus de nyid kyis mngon du sems can dmyal ba chen por mnar med par lhung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-0: khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i @435b dus na rgyal po stobs po che lus yongs su btang ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang po mchod sbyin chen po'i bar chad bya bar 'dod pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-9: de'i tshe yang lhas byin blun pos phrag dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-10: zhe sdang gi bsam pas nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad bya bar 'dod pa las gzhig par ma nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-11: sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-12: ngas deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi mchod sbyin bshams pa na yang lhas byin blun po da dung zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-13: phrag dog gi bsam pa rnyed pa la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir 'khor mang po kha bsdus nas nga la gsod par 'dod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-14: nga sngon bya rgod phung po'i ri la shong du 'chag pa las lhas byin bdag nyid ri'i steng du 'dzeg nas 'khrul 'khor gyi rdo 'phangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-15: bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bshig nas nga la ngan sems bskyed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:435b-16: bdag nyid rnyed pa dang 'byor ba'i mthu nyams par byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par lhung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:436a-3: yid kyis nyes pa byas pa med kyang yun ring po nas nga la dgrar 'du shes so //
