K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-5: snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa med kyang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis longs spyod dang ldan par gyur par zad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-6: longs spyod kyi dngos po dag la 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-8: sems can rnams dang thun mong du longs spyod par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-9: dngos po 'di la bdag gi skal pa yod pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang skal pa yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-11: mood dgal; ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur kyang bdag gi longs spyod la bdag kyang skal pa yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-12: sems can yang skal pa yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-15: sems can rnams kyi yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:441b-16: bdag la skal pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-0: snyam du sems pa kho nar @442a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-2: ngas sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur pa rjes su thob par gyur kyang de la mngon par zhen pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-3: yongs su sdud cing len par yang mi byed pas chos rnams yongs su spong ba la mos par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-4: chos rnams dang du len pa la mos par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-5: stong pa'i chos thams cad la mos par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-6: yod pa'i chos thams cad la mos par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-7: nye bar zhi ba'i chos thams cad la mos par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-8: chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la mos par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-9: gzod ma nas med pa nyid la mos par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-10: gzod ma nas yod pa nyid la mos par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-13: ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na rang gi lus la me sbar nas lam stor ba'i sems can rnams snang bar byas te lam bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442a-16: ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du sha za ba'i sems can rnams la rang gi sha bcad nas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-0: ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe tshe rabs brgya stong @442b tshad med pa snyed du khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams la lus las khrag phyung ste sbyin pa yongs su btang nas rab tu tshim par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-2: mdor na 'jig rten pa'i nor rdzas sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-3: longs spyod par bya ba ci yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-4: sems can rnams la nam yang phangs shing ser sna byas ma myong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-5: thams cad kyang sems can rnams la 'tshe ba med pa; gnod pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-6: mkhas pa rnams kyis gnang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-7: 'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur pa de ltar ngas yun ring por brtags te sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-10: 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-11: de rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las bde bar slar log ste rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer du zhugs te khyim gyi sgor phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-12: de'i tshe grong khyer na gnas pa'i slong mo ba mang po rnams kyis de yongs su bskor nas de'i mdun du 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-13: legs par rnyed pa bde bar byon tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-15: bdag cag slong ba mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-16: gal te gnang bar gyur na bdag cag bslang bar 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-18: de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas slong mo ba de dag la 'di skad du khyed slongs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:442b-19: nga la ci bdog pa phangs pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-0: @443a *// de nas slong mo ba rnams kyis legs par rnyed pa la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-1: khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po nas rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che rnams bdag cag la byin cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-2: des bdag cag rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-4: de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas nor bu rin po che gcig cig kyang gser srang brgya stong du ma ri ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu snyed kyi rin po che rnams ma lus par slong mo ba rnams la byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-6: legs par rnyed ba des de ltar nor mang po rnams yongs su btang bar gyur kyang sems la gyur pa'am 'gyod par gyur ba ci yang med do; ;de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas rin po che mang po slong mo ba rnams la yongs su btang nas khyim du yang ma zhugs par slar log ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-7: rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las snga ma bas phyed 'gyur gyis bzang ba'i rin po che mang po thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-8: lo brgyad cu 'das nas slar rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer du 'jug pa las de'i tshe nyes pa byas pa'i mi dag cig gshed ma bas bzung ste bcings nas mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i rnga yang brdungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-9: lam gyi bzhi mdo rnams su bsgrags pa yang byas nas gsad pa'i gnas su khrid de gsod par byas pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443a-10: de'i tshe gsad pa la thug pa de dag gis rgyang nas legs par rnyed pa mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-0: bdag cag @443b la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-1: bdag cag gsad pa'i nyes pa las skyobs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-2: bdag cag la srog byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-4: sbyin bdag chen po skyes bu dam pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-5: legs par rnyed pas de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-6: gsad pa la thug pa de dag la kye khyed la mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-7: khyed gsod pa'i nyes pa las yongs su bskyab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-8: zhes smras nas gshed ma de dag gi drung du song nas re re la yang nor bu rin po che gser srang bye ba ri ba re re byin nas khyed cag deng bdag rgyal po'i drung nas slar ma 'ongs kyi bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras te; de nas legs par rnyed pa myur zhing rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-11: rin po che bzang po dag gis mi 'di dag gi srog 'jal bar 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-14: mi 'di dag gi nyes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-15: gtang du mi rung bas btsong du mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-16: gal te snying thag pa nas nye bar 'dod na; khyod la nor ci bdog pa thams cad zad par nga la byin la la bdag nyid kyang shi bar khas len na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-19: de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas de skad smras pa thos pa dang rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-20: rnyed pa chen po thob pas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:443b-21: mi 'di dag gi skyabs byas par gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-2: zhes de nas legs par rnyed pas mi de dag bskyabs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-3: gsad pa'i nyes pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim na nor ci bdog pa dang; rgya mtsho chen po nas thob pa'i nor bu rin po che gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-4: dngul la sogs pa bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa rnams rgyal po la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-5: rgyal po chen po; ;mi de dag gtang du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-6: bdag la nor ci bdog pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-8: rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas gshed ma dag la bsgo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-9: legs par rnyed pa 'di khrid la sod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-12: zhes rgyal po'i bka' mnyan nas legs par rnyed pa bcings te gsad pa'i gnas su khrid nas lag pa g-yas pa btag ste legs par rnyed pa la mtshon gdab par gzas pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-13: lag pa rengs nas gdab tu ma btub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-14: skrag cing ngo mtshar du gyur nas legs par rnyed pa khrid de rgyal po la dngos po 'di zhib tu gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-16: rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas bdag nyid mtshon thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-17: legs par rnyed pa gsad par 'dod pa'i phyir mtshon btab ste gdab par gzas pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444a-18: de'i tshe rgyal po de'i lag pa gnyis sa la lhung ste sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa chen po thob nas skad ngan phyung ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-0: @444b khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bor gyur pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-5: lhas byin blun po 'di nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na yang lhas byin gyis nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-8: deng nga bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe yang nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-9: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-12: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang gnod pa bya bar mi nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-13: lhas byin blun pos lta smos kyang ci dgos pas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-14: lhas byin ni; da ltar yang grogs po ma rungs pa bsdus nas nga la gsod par yang 'dod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-15: bdag nyid kyang thabs kyis nga gsod par 'dod pas rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-17: mthu stobs nyams nas gson por lus 'di dang bcas par sems can dmyal ba mnar med par lhung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-19: nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gang la yang lhas byin lta bur phan btags pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:444b-21: byas pa drin du mi gzo'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-0: nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems @445a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-1: can rnams la pha ma lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-3: sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-5: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na gangs ri'i rgyal po'i drung na glang po che lnga brgya zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-6: de'i nang na glang po che'i rgyal po bdag por gyur pa byad bzhin sdug cing yid du 'ong ba stobs po che shes pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-7: de'i tshe glang po che mang po rnams ri srang nyam nga zhing dog pa lam gcig las med pa zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par gyur pa rngon pas mthong nas mtshan thog thag lam nyam nga ba der rlubs chen po brkos nas 'di snyam du glang po che mang po 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-8: 'dir lhung bar 'gyur bas thams cad bdag dbang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-9: bdag gis dga' mgur blang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-11: mtshan thog thag rlubs brkos zin nas glang po che mang po rnams bdas pas lam nyam nga zhing rlubs yod pa'i steng du btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-12: glang po che mang po rnams 'byung bar byas pa las rlubs chen po yod par mthong nas brgal bar ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445a-14: de'i tshe glang po che'i bdag po des bdag nyid kyi lus rlubs kyi steng du 'phred du nyal te zam pa byas nas glang po che lnga brgya rgyab kyi steng du brdzis nas de las brgal te dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-0: glang po che @445b mang po bzlas nas bdag nyid kyi mthus mchongs pa byas te song ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-1: de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-2: sdig can rlubs zab brkos gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-3: de na glang bdag blo ldan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-4: bdag dang gzhan yang bzlas pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-5: don med rlubs zab brkos par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-7: khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po dbang po rno zhing mthu chen po dang ldan par gyur pa byung ba de gzhan yin snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che lnga brgya byung ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-12: da ltar gyi dge slong lnga brgya po lhas byin gyis gzhig par byas par brtsams pa dag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon par gyur pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-14: lhas byin la sogs pa dge slong lnga po 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-16: ka ta mo ra ka ti sha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-18: ko ka li ka la sogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-21: yun ring po nas rtag par sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams mthong bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-22: de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-23: sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-25: sems can dbul phongs pa dag la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-26: zang zing yongs su btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-27: sems can gang lam log par zhugs pa dag la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-28: yang dag pa'i lam bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:445b-29: sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba dag la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-2: sems can gang bkres shing skom pa rnams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-4: btung ba yongs su btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-5: sems can gang sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba dag la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-7: khrag gis tshim par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-10: sngon smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas pas sems can rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-11: snyoms las med par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-13: ngas sems bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la tha dad par gyur pa ci yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-14: brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-15: snyoms las kyis bar chad byas par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-16: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-19: ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446a-20: thugs rje chen po'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-0: de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du dge slong glang po che'i lag ces bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas @446b pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-2: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las dka' ba spyod pa'i dngos po 'di dag thos pas lus kyi spu yang ldang zhing mchi ma byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-3: deng bdag gis dngos po zhig zhu bar 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-4: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di skad du ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-7: dang po thugs bskyed pa nas sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam bzhes pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-8: gal te de lta bu'i thugs dam bzhes pa lags par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-9: da ltar yongs su bzla bar mdzad pa'i sems can da dung ma bas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gal te 'ga' zhig mchis nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyed kyi ston pa chen po sngon sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam bzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-12: sems can da dung ma zad par bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de ci'i phyir zhes rgol ba zhig mchis par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:446b-13: de la lan ji skad du gdab par bgyi lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-1: kyis dge slong glang po che'i lag la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-2: gal te 'ga' zhig de skad du rgol bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-3: de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-4: khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la sems can yin par 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-5: de gal te 'di skad du phung po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-7: khams gang yin pa dag la sems can yin par 'dod ces zer na; de nyid la slar 'di skad dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-10: khams 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems can yin par 'dod dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-11: 'on te bral zhing gyes par gyur pa la sems can yin par 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:447a-12: des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:452b-0: @452b gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcod par mdzad pa yin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-1: bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur bar mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-2: 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-6: deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing spro ba bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-9: shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-10: bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad de; de lta bu'i dngos po de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-13: sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-15: de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:457b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de lta bu tshad ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyod de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-4: sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs su bzla bar bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-9: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-11: bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-12: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-13: dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-15: tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458b-2: lha ma yan du bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458b-3: tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458b-5: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-003:458b-6: gang pos zhus pa'i le'u ste /
